name: Sock Monkey Crochet Beanie - Vintage
description:
Sock monkey is a classic toy. And now he is becoming a classic beanie that is great to wear out and about or to use as a photography prop.

This sock monkey beanie has been handmade using crochet and cotton yarn. The beanie features the classic sock monkey colors of red, white, and marled brown.

What you will receive:

~ 1 Sock Monkey Beanie as pictured in your choice of size

~~Sizes~~

The beanie is pictured is 6 - 12 months, but the following sizes are also available:

Preemie – 9”
0 – 3 months – 14”
3 -6 month – 15 - 16”
6-12 month – 16 - 18”
12 – 24 month – 18 - 19”
2T-4T – 19 - 21”

Please let me know which size you would prefer in the notes to seller box of your order.

Larger sizes are available. Contact me for more information.

~~Made to Order~~

All orders are custom made in the order that they are received.

~~Shipping Time~~

Shipping is via USPS First Class Mail.

~~Custom Orders~~

Want to create your own beanie? Contact me to discuss your ideas. The possibilities are endless. Check out this section for some ideas and to see other little man beanies - http://www.etsy.com/shop/mimisbabies?section_id=6717517.

This listing only shows one available, but I will be happy to set up a custom listing for you if you would like more than one.

~~Contact Me~~

Email - mimisbabies@charter.net
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/mimisbabies
Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/mimisbabiesetsy

~~Photography Credit~~

Special thanks to Catching Life's Moments Photography for the 2nd, 3rd, and 4th pictures - http://www.catchinglifesmoments.com.

Special thanks to Your Story Captured Photography for the picture ~ www.yourstorycaptured.com.

Special thanks to Pixie Memories for the second picture - http://www.pixiememories.com.

Thank you for stopping by!

name: Turquoise and Lime Green Crochet Flower Hairclips - Set of 2
description:
This hairclip set is available to one lucky Facebook fan.  Only one is available so get it while you can!  Happy Monday Madness!! 

Wouldn't these be cute to accent your little one's ponytails? Or wear them clipped individually or as a pair on a headband. 

This listing is for a set of two of our all new crochet flower hair clips in Turquoise and Lime Green. Each clip features a hand crocheted triple layer flower with a lime green button center. 

Each crochet flower measures approximately 3". This clip can be worn in your sweet girl's hair, clipped to a headband, or clipped to a beanie.

The flower is attached to a grosgrain ribbon lined alligator clip. Other backings are available. Just write me a note in the notes to seller and indicate if you would like a french barrette, pin backing, or ponytail holder.

Crochet flower hair clips are made to order so please allow 2 days for your clippies to be made custom for you.
